content.html: Discovered that I’ve been blocked by a well-known hardware hacker on Twitter. Not massively bothered about losing their feed, but I’ve never interacted with them, so I’m really curious to learn why. (If I’ve fucked up somehow, I’d like to correct my mistake and apologise)
content.value:
Discovered that I’ve been blocked by a well-known hardware hacker on Twitter.

Not massively bothered about losing their feed, but I’ve never interacted with them, so I’m really curious to learn why.

(If I’ve fucked up somehow, I’d like to correct my mistake and apologise)
